languages.text: "Смотрите, со мной кибермастиф Соломона! Стал бы он приказывать псу охранять какую-то девку из местных?"
"Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"
languages.original_text: "Смотрите, со мной кибермастиф Соломона! Стал бы он приказывать псу охранять какую-то девку из местных?"

traits.locale_text: "Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order a dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"
"Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order a dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"
"Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order a dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"
"Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"
"Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"

languages.text: “自己看，索罗蒙的生化獒犬就在我身边！他真的会让他的狗去保护某个随处可见的塔瑟拉姑娘吗？”
languages.original_text: "Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"

traits.locale_text: “自己看，索罗蒙的生化獒犬就在我身边！他真的会让他的狗去保护某个随处可见的塔瑟拉姑娘吗？”

languages.text: «¡Miren, tengo conmigo al cibermastín de Solomorne! ¿Acaso ordenaría él a su perro que protegiese a una moza thasseriana cualquiera?».
languages.original_text: "Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Miren, tengo conmigo al cibermastín de Solomorne! ¿Acaso ordenaría él a su perro que protegiese a una moza thasseriana cualquiera?».

languages.text: "Bakın, Solomorne'un siber mastifi yanımda! Köpeğine Thasseralı bir dilberi korumasını emreder miydi?"
languages.original_text: "Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"

traits.locale_text: "Bakın, Solomorne'un siber mastifi yanımda! Köpeğine Thasseralı bir dilberi korumasını emreder miydi?"

languages.text: 「ほら、ソロモーンのサイバーマスチフを連れているんだ！彼が自分の犬にタッセーラ人の女の子を守らせると思うか？」
languages.original_text: "Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"

traits.locale_text: 「ほら、ソロモーンのサイバーマスチフを連れているんだ！彼が自分の犬にタッセーラ人の女の子を守らせると思うか？」

languages.text: « Écoutez, j'ai le cyber-mastiff de Solomorne avec moi ! Croyez-vous vraiment qu'il ordonnerait à son fidèle compagnon de garder un péquenot de Thassera ? »
languages.original_text: "Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez, j'ai le cyber-mastiff de Solomorne avec moi ! Croyez-vous vraiment qu'il ordonnerait à son fidèle compagnon de garder un péquenot de Thassera ? »

languages.text: "Seht her, ich habe Solomornes Cyber-Mastiff bei mir! Würde er seinem Hund befehlen, irgendein thasserianisches Mädchen zu bewachen?"
languages.original_text: "Look, I have Solomorne's cyber-mastiff with me! Would he order his dog to guard some Thasserian chit?"

traits.locale_text: "Seht her, ich habe Solomornes Cyber-Mastiff bei mir! Würde er seinem Hund befehlen, irgendein thasserianisches Mädchen zu bewachen?"
